name: I'm scared of the dark - A bad astronaut meme game made in 1 hour
name_original: I'm scared of the dark - A bad astronaut meme game made in 1 hour
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING FOR THE END!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Made in one hour lmao.
Use arrow keys to move. 
If you choose Easy, the game will be very easy.
IF you choose EXTREME, the game will only give you 1 life instead of 500.
Settings still in development.
Yes, I know this game is bad, but I made it like that intentionally.
